mapper.select: SELECT clasEnrollNo, codeNum, title, name, startDate, endDate, startTime, endTime, price, status, onOff, description, location, minNum, maxNum, book, material, writer, regDate, etc FROM classEnroll WHERE classEnrollNo = #{classEnrollNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classEnroll (codeNum, title, name, startDate, endDate, startTime, endTime, price, status, onOff, description, location, minNum, maxNum, book, material, writer, regDate, modifyDate, etc) VALUES (#{codeNum}, #{title}, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{price}, #{status}, #{onOff}, #{description}, #{location}, #{minNum}, #{maxNum}, #{book}, #{material}, #{writer}, #{regDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{etc})
